name: Version 1.5 [README]
info:
This node provides Object Detection Analytics Data.
Common use cases are:
* Presence transitions
* Queue management

The Dashboard nodes provides a way for installers and administrators to filter out unwanted detections.

To use in a custom service, creat a new tab and link to one or more
* detections
* counter
* state
* exceptions


NOTE: This flow requires the "Device Info" flow" from examples or
https://github.com/pandosme/CamFlows/blob/master/flows/Device%20Info.json
This flow stores information about the camera in global context.

name: set flow.settings.confidence
Detections filter
Default settings
func:
msg.payload = {
    service: "ObjectDetections",
    aoi: {
        id: "aoi",
        x1: 200,
        y1: 200,
        x2: 800,
        y2: 800
    },
    age: 2,
    distance: 10,
    confidence: 30,
    classes: ["Human", "Car"],
    timeout: 5,
    threshold: 1
}

return msg;

name: Presence counter
Presence state
Init
Visualization
Validate
